price: خراپەکاران بەڕوخساریاندا دەناسرێنەوە، ئەمجا ڕائەکێشرێن بەمووی پێشی سەریان وبەقاچیان (بۆ ناو دۆزەخ)
arabic: يُعۡرَفُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ بِسِيمَٰهُمۡ فَيُؤۡخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَٰصِي وَٱلۡأَقۡدَامِ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yuʿ'rafu al-muj'rimūna bisīmāhum fayu'khadhu bil-nawāṣī wal-aqdāmi
